name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 10, 31 on-the-job employees of the Xi County Branch of the Linfen Municipal Ecological Environment Bureau announced a collective strike.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A staff member of the Xi County Publicity Department said, "The county is holding a meeting to study the situation. The specific situation will not be known until after the meeting." The staff member added to the reporter that the meeting had already been discussed in the morning, and "the relevant situation will be officially announced on Xi County Media."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 11, a security guard at a university in Guangzhou smashed a student's takeaway food on the ground.
The school's relevant personnel said that the school has a policy that does not allow takeaway food to enter the campus. However, the security guard's behavior is a personal behavior and has nothing to do with the school. He will be punished accordingly in the future.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 12, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs said that three people were killed in Israel, but did not mention that the murderer was a Hamas terrorist, nor did it condemn it.
The Global Times opened a selection of comments under the Weibo post, but did not open a topic.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Even the patriotic maggots can’t stand it in the forwarding section

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The English translation of the recently held 3rd China Tibet “Circum-Himalaya” International Cooperation Forum no longer uses “Tibet” but uses the Chinese pinyin “Xizang”.
Media reports that the English translation of Tibet no longer uses “Tibet” but uses the Chinese pinyin “Xizang” in accordance with the law.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After the press conference, a White House spokesman told The Washington Post that the president's comments were based on statements by Prime Minister Netanyahu's spokesman and media reports from Israel, and that Biden and U.S. officials had not independently viewed the photos or confirmed the reports.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 12, the Eastern Theater Command issued a statement on the US military aircraft flying through the Taiwan Strait: A US P-8A anti-submarine patrol aircraft flew through the Taiwan Strait and publicly hyped it up. The Eastern Theater Command of the People's Liberation Army organized fighter jets to monitor and guard against the US aircraft's passing through the Strait and dealt with it in accordance with the law.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Interestingly, a fake news that China had shot down a US military plane was circulated wildly on WeChat.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Lao Hu, is this the India you are talking about the same India that people often talk about on the Internet?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Teacher Tang Danhong @DanHongTang is a writer and poet who has lived in Israel for 18 years. 
Since the Hamas attack on October 7, she has been posting and sharing the local situation on Twitter, and has been doing local volunteer work with her husband. 
She blames Hamas for the attack and also blames the Israeli far right for the infringement on the Palestinians. In her opinion, the extremists on both sides are constantly pushing this land into an unsolvable abyss. 
In the face of the current dispute over positions on the Internet, she said that the current debates and positions on the Internet are far from reality. 
For her and the locals, what is being considered is how the Palestinian and Israeli sides will coexist in the future, how to reduce the number of extremists on both sides, and how to unite the forces of peace-loving people on both sides. 
History cannot be changed, and people living on this land at this moment need to look forward. 
After living in Israel for 18 years, how do I view the Palestinian-Israeli conflict? Dialogue with Teacher Tang Danhong [Teacher Li is not your teacher]

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 12, the official blog of Henan Nanyang Vocational College was reported online to have posted a message saying, "A group of students only know how to lead the trend and yell every day, just to make you screw in and make money." This sparked heated discussions among netizens.
The school issued a statement saying that it was posted by someone who had maliciously hacked the account and hoped that everyone would not spread it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of October 12, a male student from Beijing Normal University ran naked on campus.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is said that when he was bathing, another boy kept whistling, which annoyed him. He then reprimanded the boy and told him to stop whistling. The two fought. He then rushed out of the men's bath naked and smashed things on the first floor of the bathhouse. He then rushed out of the bathhouse naked and ran. Finally, six security guards pinned him to the ground. He shouted "Kill me! Kill me!"

content: More than 300,000 Gaza residents have been displaced by the air strikes.

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Disposable
Affected by the Israeli-Palestinian conflict, a large number of netizens went to the famous foreign 50 cents, Israeli Gao Yousi's video to insult him.
In 2021, Gao Yousi went to Xinjiang under official arrangement to shoot a video to refute the unwarranted accusation of "forced labor" in Xinjiang, which triggered heated discussions inside and outside the wall.
Now, his identity as an Israeli makes him bear his own original sin of the Internet in simplified Chinese.
